description: Allen-Bradley 2711-K3A5L1 PanelView 300 Monochrome, 3-inch Terminal, Keypad, RS-232 (DH-485) Communication Port & RS-232 Printer Port, DC Power Supply, Series B
miscellaneous: PanelView 300 and 300 Micro terminals are 24V DC only.
specifications: Display Description: Monochrome transflective LCD with integral LED backlight; Display Area (WxH): 73 x 42 mm (2.87 x 1.67 in); Resolution: 128 x 64; Backlight: 100 000 h LED backlight life; Real-time Clock: Battery-back clock time stamps critical data; Application Software: PanelBuilder32 Software; Application Memory: 170 K Application Runtime; 240 K Flash (application objects + text + bitmaps); Keypad Description: Stainless steel domed membrane; Input Voltage: 11-30V DC.
